name: Fill a register registration form using mandatory fields

testSteps.description: Example: {firstName=Johan, lastName=Muneton, password=123456789, address=avenida siempre viva 123, city=Juneau, state=Alaska, postalCode=00001, country=United States, phone=3001234567}

children.description: Given the user is on landing page of automationpractice

And him has filled it and submitted
| firstName | Johan |
| lastName | Muneton |
| password | 123456789 |
| address | avenida siempre viva 123 |
| city | Juneau |
| state | Alaska |
| postalCode | 00001 |
| country | United States |
| phone | 3001234567 |
Then the user will see a confirmation message.

userStory.narrative:
As an automation tester
    I need to practice automation testing using Screenplay patter
    for learn about serenity BDD framework

title: Fill a register registration form using mandatory fields

When him browse to register

scenarioOutline:
Given the user is on landing page of automationpractice
When him browse to register
And him has filled it and submitted
|firstName | <firstName>|
|lastName | <lastName>|
|password | <password>|
|address | <address>|
|city | <city>|
|state | <state>|
|postalCode | <postalCode>|
|country | <country>|
|phone | <phone>|
Then the user will see a confirmation message.
